think_procedure: 1. Identify the purpose of the effective_cache_size knob in PostgreSQL, which indicates the amount of memory the database can use for caching data. 2. Determine if there are special values associated with this knob that alter its function. 3. Check if -1 or 0 are valid special values for effective_cache_size and what they signify. 4. Conclude whether effective_cache_size has special values that break the natural order of numerical knobs.
